thread.section_title: Nebraska Furniture Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nebraska Furniture Mart | nfm.com
thread.title: SANDY MEYER
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by SANDY MEYER

author: SANDY MEYER
title: SANDY MEYER
text: I first went to your store in May 2016 when I was in Omaha for surgery at the Med Center. Returned two weeks later when I had my check up with the doctors and purchased all new furniture for living room and spare bedroom. I received excellent service and will be in Omaha again this July and plan on purchasing some other furniture. Thanks.
